entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:13 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 02:00 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -6.2°C
Wind: NE 35 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:49 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:49 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:49 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
